original_text: He commanded them, saying, “This is what you are to do: You who are in the three companies that are going on duty on the Sabbath—a third of you guarding the royal palace,
korean_text: 명령하여 이르되 너희가 행할 것이 이러하니 안식일에 들어온 너희 중 삼분의 일은 왕궁을 주의하여 지키고

sentences.original_text: This is what you are to do:
You who are in the three companies
that are going on duty on the Sabbath
a third of you guarding the royal palace,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중三分之一은 왕궁을 지키되,
